bibl.title: Gallus and the Culex.
bibl.note: To the list of literary influences on the Culex must be added another name, that of Gallus. His influence is thematic, stylistic and verbal and, at times, the Culex seems to take on the character of a pastiche of his work.
bibl.seg: Kennedy Duncan F., Gallus and the Culex.

To the list of literary influences on the Culex must be added another name, that of Gallus. His influence is thematic, stylistic and verbal and, at times, the Culex seems to take on the character of a pastiche of his work.
